name: Fix Anime/Manga Info Hover
description:
The anime search pages have a bug where the hover info stays fixed or vanishes when you point to it, this fixes it for me hopefully for you too (not tested by other users)

test here:
https://myanimelist.net/anime.php

In the worst case scenario it still persists on screen: you should be able to click the side of the page to remove the box. Also, when it does glitch, it should fade in so it's not as jarring.
